channel.title: +1 Forward - For the Dungeon
channel.description:
It's a new episode of +1 Forward - Fore the Dungeon https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/for-the-dungeon
Come listen to Rich talk with Jordan about For the Dungeon that is fully funded on Kickstarter and ending soon!
Timecodes: 01:11 - Read a Sitch about Saying Yes and Playing to Find Out 09:28 - Open Your Brain to For the Dungeon 14:18 - Act Under Fire with Plussy the Ork Invading a Castle
Kickstarter link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thearmoredduck/for-the-dungeon

item.title: +1 Forward - For the Dungeon
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

It’s a new episode of +1 Forward - Fore the Dungeon

THE GAUNTLET

For the Dungeon

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/+1-forward/id1110623840 RSS:  http://1forward.libsyn.com/rss

Come listen to Rich talk with Jordan about For the Dungeon that is fully funded on Kickstarter and ending soon!

Timecodes:
01:11 - Read a Sitch about Saying Yes and Playing to Find Out
09:28 - Open Your Brain to For the Dungeon
14:18 - Act Under Fire with Plussy the Ork Invading a Castle

Kickstarter link:

Kickstarter

For the Dungeon!

Play the minions, not the heroes. A tabletop RPG about the misfortunes of a career in dungeon security.
